resume_text:
Abhishek Jha
♂phone6289716964 |/envel⌢pejhaa213152@gmail.com |/linkedinlinkedin.com/abhishek |/githubgithub.com/abhishek |/codeleetcode.com/abhishek

Shree Jain Vidyalaya kolkata

Hind Motor High School kolkata

Experience
Twowaits Technologies March 2024 – May 2024
Technical Content Writer Remote
•Conceptualized comprehensive technical content on Data Structures and Algorithms concepts.
•Created dry run pictorial examples to clarify concepts, using different shapes, canvas, and related tools for visual
representation.
•Collaborated with technical writers, editors, and subject matter experts to ensure the accuracy, consistency, and
quality of all written materials.
Projects
Laundry Utility |React Native, React, Express, Firebase, Redux ♂share-square June 2024 – August 2024
•Developed a laundry service platform with payment integration using React Native for the mobile app and React.js
for the website, featuring item selection, address input, date and time scheduling with real-time validation
•Implemented Firebase for authentication and Express for a robust backend
•Used Redux Toolkit for efficient state management and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive, modern UI that
enhances usability and visual appeal
Youtube Sentiment Analysis |Flask, Youtube Data API, React, VADER Library ♂share-square Dec 2023 – Mar 2024
•Implemented a sentiment analysis on YouTube video comments, where users enter a video URL to receive an
analysis of the total number of comments, including positive and negative comments
•Used VADER sentiment analysis to evaluate YouTube comments with 90% accuracy, providing sentiment insights
via the YouTube API
•Built a robust backend using Flask and React.js for the frontend
Background Removerl |React, Removebg API ♂share-square Apr 2023 – June 2023
•Developed a user-friendly React.js interface for automated image background removal, focusing on reusable
components and a robust design, achieving a 90% reduction in background removal errors
•Showcased frontend development and API integration skills with DOM manipulation and React hooks, enhancing
UI engagement and increasing user retention rates by 25%
Skills
Programming : Java, SQL, JavaScript, Python
Development : React Js, React Native, HTML, CSS, Express.js, Firebase, Tailwind CSS
CS Fundamentals : Data Structure & Algorithms, Object Oriented Programming, DBMS, Computer Networks
Accomplishments
Scored 3325 rank out of 34697 in biweekly contest 135.
Solved more than 500 questions on various coding platforms.
Interest & Hobbies
Video Editing
Reading
Cricket

conversation.content:
Hello Abhishek, it's great to meet you.  Thanks for your time.

Your resume mentions a Laundry Utility project using React Native, React, and Express. Can you briefly describe the architecture of that application?

technicalSkills.details: Abhishek demonstrates familiarity with a range of technologies including React Native, React, Express, Firebase, and Redux.  His project, a Laundry Utility application, showcases his ability to apply these technologies to build a functional application. However, the interview only provided a brief overview of the project architecture, leaving the depth of his understanding unclear. Further probing into specific architectural decisions and problem-solving within the project would be necessary to gain a more complete assessment of his technical proficiency.

communicationSkills.details: Based on the limited provided conversation, Abhishek's communication seems adequate.  He responded appropriately to the interviewer's question and appears to be able to articulate his project work in a concise manner.  More detailed conversations would be needed to fully evaluate his ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly and effectively.

problemSolvingAbilities.details: The interview did not assess problem-solving skills directly.  While the Laundry Utility project suggests an ability to tackle a complex development challenge, the specifics of the challenges faced and how they were overcome remain unknown.  Further questions about specific technical hurdles encountered during development would provide a more comprehensive assessment.

culturalFit.details: Insufficient information is available to assess Abhishek's cultural fit within a potential team.  Further questions exploring his teamwork experiences, preferred work style, and approach to collaboration would be necessary.

strengths: Familiarity with popular JavaScript frameworks (React, React Native, Redux)
weaknesses: Lack of demonstrated depth in architectural design and problem-solving
Limited interview responses prevent comprehensive evaluation of communication and problem-solving skills
The project description is very brief;  more details are needed to judge technical expertise fully.

overallImpression.details: Abhishek shows potential based on his project experience and listed skills. However, the interview provided limited insight into the depth of his technical skills and problem-solving abilities. A more in-depth technical discussion, exploring specific architectural choices, challenges faced, and problem-solving approaches, is crucial to determine his suitability for a role.

recommendationsForImprovement: Prepare to discuss technical details of projects in more depth, focusing on design decisions and problem-solving approaches.
Practice explaining complex technical concepts clearly and concisely.
Develop a more comprehensive portfolio showcasing a broader range of projects and challenges.
Highlight soft skills and teamwork experience to better demonstrate cultural fit.
